Learner.train[source]

Learner.train(scoring:str='accuracy', cv:int=3, n_jobs:int=-1)

Run GridSearchCV for all models on X_train and y_train of dataset.

Args: scoring: https://scikit-learn.org/stable/modules/model_evaluation.html#scoring-parameter cv: defaults to 3-fold cv n_jobs: defaults to -1 to use all cores Returns: train_results: list of grid search results grid_list: list of trained grid objects

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Learner.get_top_5_train_results()

Learner.predict()

Get predictions on the datasets X_test from best estimators of GridSearchCV.
